description: This is a CSS file that defines styles and theme variables for a two-player tic-tac-toe frontend application, including light and dark theme colors, layout styles for various components, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styles including background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including layout properties and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
